solution_line_template: After giving the boy his stickers, she has {initial_stickers} - {stickers_given_to_boy} = <<{initial_stickers}-{stickers_given_to_boy}={stickers_after_boy}>>{stickers_after_boy} stickers left.
She gives her best friends {stickers_after_boy} / {friends_divisor} = <<{stickers_after_boy}/{friends_divisor}={stickers_given_to_friends}>>{stickers_given_to_friends} stickers
This leaves Clara with {stickers_after_boy} - {stickers_given_to_friends} stickers = <<{stickers_after_boy}-{stickers_given_to_friends}={stickers_left}>>{stickers_left} stickers.
